summary: Four friends begin to question women and relationships when one of them announces impending nuptials.

Hughley|Bill Bellamy|Shemar Moore|Gabrielle Union|Tatyana Ali|Jenifer Lewis|Tamala Jones|Clifton Powell|Susan Dalian|Marla Gibbs|Julie Benz|Vanessa Bell Calloway|Angelle Brooks|Kimberly Scott|Aloma Wright|Sean P. title: Más que amigos, hermanos
